name: pbr-materials
description: Create and validate Three.js PBR materials with strict metalness/roughness rules
capabilities: Texture mapping (diffuse, normal, roughness, metalness, AO)
validation_rules: Metalness MUST be strictly 0.0 OR 1.0 - NO mid-range values allowed
Always use metalness/roughness workflow, not specular/glossiness
example_usage: Use this skill when creating or modifying materials for 3D objects
